title: Enable file transfer/android auto.
content: I want my phone to always select the file transfer / android auto option when I try to pair with my linux computer.  I know that I can get this to happen if I click on the  the notification sent to the phone when I try to pair and select the file transfer/android auto option there but the extra step should not be necessary (indeed it was not on my earlier phone, a Sampson j3). How do I change the default usb setting?  I looked for something in the developer options which allowed me to do this but did not find anything.  I was hoping that this changed when I went to Android 11 but it still works the same.
